property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise like the sun, stand like the mountain, charge like the lion, die as a hero." - General Takeno

property.name: Rules
property.value: Empty-Shrine Kannushi has protection from the colors of permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crease the folds, bend the paper, turn the spirits, shield the soul."

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Faithful Squire. At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Faithful Squire, you may flip it.
-------
Kaiso, Memory of Loyalty Legendary Creature - Spirit
Flying Remove a ki counter from Kaiso, Memory of Loyalty: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. 3/4

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clashing warriors turned to face O-Kagachi, the greatest kami, and their sigh of awe was their last breath." - Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Plains {2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Plains becomes a 2/5 white Spirit creature with "Whenever this creature deals damage, its controller gains that much life." It's still a land. When enchanted Plains is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fields from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a shining in the mortal heart that even the kami cannot reach." - Sensei Golden-Tail

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane - Tap an untapped white creature you control. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a Samurai you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Indebted Samurai.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me, Saburo. I could not save you. But your blade will not rest in my hand."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Kami of False Hope: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Across the rift of battle, a bridge of gossamer. And for one moment, it holds." - Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of Tattered Shoji gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It remembered all the shadows lantern-cast upon its paper wings, and sometimes those silhouettes played across its shape again, acting out silent tragedies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Kami of the Honored Dead is dealt damage, you gain that much life. Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) You may pay {X} rather than pay the mana cost for Samurai spells you cast, where X is that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonds of bushido will draw the dishonored back someday, and I will be there waiting."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to each creature and each player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who am I to judge who is deserving and who is not? That is a question for lords, not healers."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can staunch their blood, mend their flesh, and knit their bones. But I cannot restore their hope." - Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Moonlit Strider: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to Opal-Eye, Konda's Yojimbo instead. {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Opal-Eye this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her angry call split the sky. From that rift descended her champions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fox offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Fox and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Fox. Mana cost includes color.) Whenever a creature attacks, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target enchantment. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a white card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. The next X damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or creatures you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wish there were no use for those with my talents. I wish that I could walk Kamigawa forgotten and unneeded, with no war wounds to heal and no broken bones to mend."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Takeno's Cavalry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking Spirit.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At night he perfected his aim, shooting spiderwebs by starlight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may search your library for an Aura card with enchant creature, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Isolated on its little candlewick, the kami never heard of the crime that drove its comrades to war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within." - Noboru, master kitemaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was as though the sky opened its eyes and found what it saw displeasing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn is dealt to any target instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reluctant to strike at the kami directly, some kitsune trained in more passive fighting techniques.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Waxmane Baku. {1}, Remove X ki counters from Waxmane Baku: Tap X target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a legendary permanent other than Yomiji, Who Bars the Way is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As I died, I rejoiced. I would see my family again. But then I woke up back on the battlefield. Back in Kamigawa. Back in hell." - Kenzo the Hardhearted

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Callow Jushi. At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Callow Jushi, you may flip it.
-------
Jaraku the Interloper Legendary Creature - Spirit
Remove a ki counter from Jaraku the Interloper: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. 3/4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chisei, Heart of Oceans unless you remove a counter from a permanent you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a blue card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell if its mana value is X.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Tap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a small thing, a drop of water . . . And yet enough of them together can flood a field, cleanse a mire, or choke a forest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Island {2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mill a card, then draw cards equal to the milled card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once, I looked to the mists for wisdom. Now I wish only for understanding."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Higure, the Still Wind deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a Ninja card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {2}: Target Ninja creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bolt struck with a flash and there was a terrible sound, as of glass shattering, but the creature was unharmed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it's finished, all that's left of you is a ripple on a still pond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each spell is an intricate tapestry, and Kira is the great unraveler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. That spell's controller reveals their hand, then discards each card with the same name as a card spliced onto that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like storm water through the segments of bamboo, the spell followed the links of magic. Then it destroyed them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Moonfolk offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Moonfolk and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Moonfolk. Mana cost includes color.) Flying {1}: Put up to two land cards from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many kami could fly, which put some warriors at a distinct disadvantage. The mages of Minamo took it upon themselves to correct that imbalance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Quillmane Baku. {1}, {T}, Remove X ki counters from Quillmane Baku: Return target creature with mana value X or less to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all artifacts and enchantments to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world is a dream. We cling to our toys like children, but sooner or later we must learn to live without them." - Sensei Hisoka

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each Spirit you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If wisdom is a river, then we cup our hands, reach in, and drink from it in sips. The kami, however, are like fish, swimming, breathing, surrounded in its presence." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Shimmering Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A child's whisper could crack its shell, but not even an oni's scream could penetrate it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target player mills two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All things return to their beginnings. The waters that spill across the Kamitaki Falls flow to sea, only to be returned to her as the rain that joins the mighty river." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand, graveyard, and all permanents they own into their library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 7.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Teardrop Kami: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not fall into the trap of thinking you understand the kami. Cannot a drop of water be dew on the meadow, a glacier's thaw, or the tear of a child?" - Sensei Hisoka

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature with mana value 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Over time, Konda grew ever more suspicious, fearing even his most loyal allies were being manipulated by unseen hands." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The war sent Kamigawa into turmoil. Here it was spring and there winter. For some, time stood still, while for others, moments flashed past like minnows in a pond." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, look at the top three cards of your library instead. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Splice onto Arcane - Return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Walker of Secret Ways deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand. {1}{U}: Return target Ninja you control to its owner's hand. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Bile Urchin: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The two youths argued and tempers flared. One youth opened his mouth to utter a vile curse, but what he spat out instead was a kami of poison and filth." - Sensei Golden-Tail

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. {0}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonblack creature. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Swamp {2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Swamp becomes a 2/2 black Spirit creature with "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land. When enchanted Swamp is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fens from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What will it say on our graves, Lord Konda? Will it say we led our world to conquer immortal forces or that we were crushed by our own arrogance? At each defeat, I wonder." - Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Hired Muscle. At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Hired Muscle, you may flip it.

Scarmaker Legendary Creature - Spirit
Remove a ki counter from Scarmaker: Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) 4/4

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Swamp, destroy target nonblack creature. Splice onto Arcane - Exile four cards from your graveyard. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. {1}{B}: Regenerate Ink-Eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent exiles a card from their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kyoki, Eater of Minds, Corrupter of Thoughts, Bringer of Madness, Lord of Fear. Return, by our blood, and walk again." - Ogre chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Demons, sacrifice Mark of the Oni.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As more oni walked Kamigawa, more darkness infested its inhabitants' souls." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Nezumi Shadow-Watcher: Destroy target Ninja.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Okiba Gang Night-cursed thieves and assassins I've had enough of their meddling Triple the guard" - Marrow-Gnawer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ogre Marauder attacks, it gains "Ogre Marauder can't be blocked" until end of turn unless defending player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once freed, the oni demanded more and more sacrifices to appease them. The ogres happily obliged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Okiba-Gang Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rat offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Rat and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Rat. Mana cost includes color.) Whenever a permanent is put into an opponent's graveyard, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a Spirit or Arcane card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wizards of Takenuma Swamp faced the horrors of humanity every day. It's no wonder they fared so well against the kami." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice Pus Kami: Destroy target nonblack creature. Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life if you don't control an Ogre.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where a once-proud human city stood, only the ruins of Numai remain, deep amid rotting bamboo and plagued by oni." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 1 or less is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step if Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker is still on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a black card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Skullmane Baku. {1}, {T}, Remove X ki counters from Skullmane Baku: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {B} ({B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Skullsnatcher deals combat damage to a player, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your lungs may not draw breath, but while your hands can grip a sword, you will be useful to me." - Nighteyes, nezumi necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Takenuma Bleeder attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life if you don't control a Demon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer to weave my magic through oni blood, but yours will do in a pinch."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the kami passed over the village of Mita, the inhabitants relived their three most grievous tragedies. Some cried. Some raged. Some were driven to madness. But the next morning, none possessed the will to fight." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Throat Slitter deals combat damage to a player, destroy target nonblack creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yukora, the Prisoner leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all non-Ogre creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took ninety-nine monks to weave the spell that trapped Yukora. Upon the death of the ninety-nine, the spell was broken, and the demon returned to the mortal world seeking vengeance for its imprisonment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Akki Blizzard-Herder dies, each player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It remains unclear whether the akki shamans could in fact create storms or simply predicted them." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Akki Raider gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akki were very territorial, attacking and destroying any settlements that came too close to their mountain homes. The more successful their raids, the bolder they became.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Ashen Monstrosity attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a dull thunder at the vanguard, then shocked cries in the midst of the column. Moments later, Takada, last of the rearguard, faced the kami alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each enchantment deals 2 damage to its controller, then each Aura attached to a creature deals 2 damage to the creature it's attached to.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Blademane Baku. {1}, Remove X ki counters from Blademane Baku: For each counter removed, Blademane Baku gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a red card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Spirits have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 3 damage to target non-Spirit creature." Non-Spirit creatures have "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 3 damage to target Spirit creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the war progressed, the destruction the kami caused became more widespread and less predictable." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Cunning Bandit. At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Cunning Bandit, you may flip it.
-------
Azamuki, Treachery Incarnate Legendary Creature - Spirit
Remove a ki counter from Azamuki, Treachery Incarnate: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. 5/2

property.name: Rules
property.value: First Volley deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We searched their bodies for signs of the blades that had killed them, but found nothing more than scorched flesh." - Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. The damage can't be prevented. If that player or that planeswalker's controller would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many ogres extracted blood oaths from the oni they summoned. Others simply extracted blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mountain ogres allowed blizzards to sheathe them in ice, both to reinforce their armor and to hide their pungent musk from potential prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Frostling: It deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its bite will take off more than a toe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fumiko the Lowblood has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.) Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Mountain {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Heartless Hidetsugu deals damage to each player equal to half that player's life total, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hidetsugu held over a dozen oni in blood oath. At his touch, rocks scorched. At his word, cities burned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In desperation, Konda sent warriors to parley with the ogre-magi. No one knows whether they were slaughtered at Shinka or if they even reached its bloodstained walls." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ire of Kaminari deals damage to any target equal to the number of Arcane cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thunder broke the brittle silence over the Araba. A surge of raw energy lifted the soldier's body into the air and briefly, in the heart of the flash, he saw the face of a god." - Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a Spirit or Arcane spell, Ishi-Ishi, Akki Crackshot deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here fell Ishi-Ishi, King of the Flaming Pebbles, Scourge of the Mountain Kami, Lover of Goats. May his shell never burn." - Cave inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature If a creature dealt damage by enchanted creature this turn would die, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Switch each creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Early in his reign, Konda fell ill. His head burned with fever, and he saw visions of his future. In them, he saw a spirit-child, and, in that child's eyes, a way to make his empire last forever." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, tap Ogre Recluse.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those ogres who did not embrace oni worship were cast out, cursed, and forced into hermitage, waiting for the day the oni would come for them." - The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each time target permanent would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Goblin and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Goblin. Mana cost includes color.) Whenever Patron of the Akki attacks, creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Ronin Cliffrider attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Shinka Gatekeeper is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Understanding is not a virtue of the ogre. Do not seek to reason your way into Shinka Keep." - Kiku, Night's Flower

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Torrent of Stone deals 4 damage to target creature. Splice onto Arcane - Sacrifice two Mountains. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Soulshift 8 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 8 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Budoka Pupil. At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Budoka Pupil, you may flip it.

Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks Legendary Creature - Spirit
Trample Remove a ki counter from Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. 4/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Child of Thorns: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soratami scoff at the perils of Jukai, calling the forest an ‘unruly garden.' Perhaps we should send them a rose such as this." - Dokai, Weaver of Life

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The race is run in the mind before the first step is taken." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulshift 4, soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return up to two target Spirit cards with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Forest {2}: Enchanted Forest becomes a 4/4 green Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Forest is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Cedars from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On the fifty-seventh day of the Battle of Silk, the bell again tolled in hopes of summoning mortal aid. This time, a new breed of kami rose to answer its call." - Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from non-Spirit creatures Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) {2}: Regenerate target Samurai.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not care if he claims no allegiance in this war. Find him, Takeno." - Lord Konda

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Iwamori of the Open Fist enters the battlefield, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kodama of the Center Tree's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Spirits you control. Kodama of the Center Tree has soulshift X, where X is the number of Spirits you control. (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walk the world and you'll find your soul; search your soul and you'll discover the world." - Diary of Azusa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice three Spirits: Search your library for a legendary Spirit permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The husk splits like a madman's smile And mystery steps forth." - Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know its mood by the plants that spring up around it. When it is placid, fields of lilies flow in its wake; when it is angry, every stem has a thorn." - Isao, Enlightened Bushi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add that much {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Matsu-Tribe Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature with flying. Whenever Matsu-Tribe Sniper deals damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a green card with mana value X from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You gain X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Snake offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Snake and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Snake. Mana cost includes color.) {T}: Untap all Forests and all green creatures. Activate only once each turn.

property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Petalmane Baku. {1}, Remove X ki counters from Petalmane Baku: Add X mana of any one color.

property.value: If you control a Forest, each blocked creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane - An opponent gains 5 life. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, add that much {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Scaled Hulk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Say, what rhymes with ‘run for your lives'?" - Ku-Ku, akki poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player adds {G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, they don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Whenever a nontoken Snake enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Sosuke's Summons from your graveyard to your hand.

property.value: Exile target artifact. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.value: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Traproot Kami's toughness is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. If it's a Spirit, it gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That energy was once granted to growing things. Now the kami keep it for themselves, releasing it in sudden floods that overwhelm flesh and foliage alike." - Sakiko, Mother of Summer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We arrived at the battlefield too late. Again. Another error on your part, and you will have to answer to me personally." - General Takeno, letter to the imperial mapmaker

property.value: Only in mirrors do heroes find their equal.

Flavor
property.value: "Behind the eyelids, a flickering flame. Beneath the dream, a flickering sorrow. Can peace find you in this sleep When all the world is tossed by war?" - Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may play that card this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masako was privy to a great many of Konda's deepest secrets, and her hair was always perfect.

property.value: "One scratch on a wall meant safe passage, two that the target had already been raided, and three warned of a trap." - Weaponry of Kamigawa

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This god held prisoner in human hands has put all humanity in the hands of angry gods." - Masako the Humorless

property.value: Listen at its walls and you will hear the whispers of gods.
